useCase.name: Recruitment and Analysis

preconditions.precondition: Researcher defines criteria for participant selection

failureEndConditions.condition: Recruitment failure results in criteria adjustment and republishing

useCase.trigger: Researcher initiates recruitment and analysis process

mainSequence.step: Researcher defines criteria for participant selection
RecruitmentPlatform queries potential participants based on criteria
UserDb returns list of potential participants to RecruitmentPlatform
RecruitmentPlatform sends recruitment invitations to Participant
RecruitmentPlatform provides Researcher with list of participating users
Researcher conducts user research sessions with Participant
Participant provides feedback and data to Researcher
Researcher inputs user research data to AnalysisSystem
AnalysisSystem provides synthesized results to Researcher
Researcher updates project status to "Complete" in RecruitmentPlatform
Researcher archives project data and findings in AnalysisSystem
